trivia_pass.name: Trivia Pass
trivia_pass.description: Gives you a pass on trivia night, so you automatically pass one of the questions

trivia_start.name: Trivia Start
trivia_start.description: You can start a Trivia Night in one server, without the need of a moderator. The trivia night opportunity for that server gets used
